opinion.attorneys:
Bradshaw, Barnett Haltom, E. B. Haltom, Jr., Florence, for petitioner.
Si Garrett, Atty. Gen., L. E. Barton, Asst. Atty. Gen., opposed.
opinion.opinion_text:
Petition of Linnie Jackson for certiorari to the Court of Appeals to review and revise the judgment and decision of that Court in Jackson v. State, 72 So.2d 114.
Writ denied.
LIVINGSTON, C. J., and LAWSON and MERRILL JJ., concur.
